title: 328: WTF Happened to Us Last Week?! + Bach Nation Breakups & Hookups!
itunes:title: 328: WTF Happened to Us Last Week?! + Bach Nation Breakups & Hookups!
description:
Oh Broadsquad, The Broads are back from a week of pain and here to tell the tales as they are slowly recovering - what did they do to bring on this mouth curse?? They chat about the details of wtf really went down with them this last week - YIKES. Then they dive into the wild world (as of late) of Bachelor Nation breakups and hookups! They discuss Hannah’s latest tea about Tyler, details about the night at Pilot Pete’s parent’s house, Tayshia and Zac’s breakup, their thoughts on best friends turned lovers Katie and John, Blake’s reaction, and more! 

*Join The Broads Thursday as they dive back into Michelle’s season and recap Hometowns!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FIRSTLEAF WINE CLUB: Go to TRYFRISTLEAF.COM/CHATTY for 6 bottles of wine for $29.95 with free shipping!

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box! 

***MODERN FERTILITY: Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

***FRAMEBRIDGE: Go to FRAMEBRIDGE.COM and use promo code CHATTYBROADS to save an additional 15% off your order!

***ARTICLE: Go to ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY for $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more!ReplyReply allForward

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
